articles.author: Charles Maynes
articles.title: President Trump’s Talks with the Leaders of Russia and Ukraine - NPR
articles.description: President Trump, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and seven European leaders met at the White House to talk about ending the war between Russia and Ukraine. The meeting followed a summit between Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska last…
articles.content:
President Donald Trump, left, greets Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy as he arrives at the White House, Monday, Aug. 18, 2025, in Washington.
Alex Brandon/AP
